*Note* _Apps_ key is a key between RWin and RCtrl.

|| *Hotkey* || *GuiMacro* || *Description* ||
|| `Ctrl+'~'` ||  || Minimize/Restore ||

|| _No default_ ||  || Switch focus between ConEmu and child GUI application (e.g. PuTTY or Notepad) ||
|| _No default_ ||  || Set focus to ConEmu ||
|| _No default_ ||  || Set focus to child GUI application ||
|| _No default_ ||  || Child GUI window system menu (PuTTY, Notepad, etc.) ||
